Lunarpine growled quickly loseing his patience with the Predacon. "The
drones are for clean up purposes. They're designed to decontaminate anywhere
we go so that the virus doesn't accidentally spread." He moved closer to the
lava pool allowing the seering heat to flow past his robotic form. "You've
had long enough to think about it, are you gonna bring my associates out in
exchange for the cure or do I leave you all to a fate trapped in beast
modes?" The large silver and grey bot stood tall showing little fatigue from
the fight or suffering from the heat.
